about_the_game:
About This Game

This game sets the player in the role of Ineth, a witch that has been imprisoned in a magical world, apart from the human world. You will have to find different spells, charms, items, and secrets to help Ineth escape her prison, solving puzzles, overcoming challenging platforms, and defeating every enemy on her way.

Explore A Magical World

Set in a magical medieval world. The game is full of places to explore and secrets to discover. Find charms to boost your stats, items to help you through your quest, and rupees to buy goodies from other characters.

Challenging Platformers

Master your platformer skills and help Ineth escape her prison.

Clever Puzzles

Put your wit to the test by solving different puzzles, using the abilities you learn throughout your adventure.

Become A Great Witch

Find a great variety of spells and discover how to use them for solving puzzles, overcoming obstacles, and defeating your enemies.

short_description: A pixel-art Metroidvania with challenging platformer mechanics, set in a medieval magical world. Discover a great variety of spells and abilities to defeat enemies and solve puzzles. Find mythical charms and items to help Ineth fight her way out of her prison.
